title: 439. Please Get Your Noise Out of My Ears
description: The modern world overwhelms us with sounds we didn’t ask for, like car alarms and cell-phone “halfalogues.” What does all this noise cost us in terms of productivity, health, and basic sanity?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: The modern world overwhelms us with sounds we didn’t ask for, like car alarms and cell-phone “halfalogues.” What does all this noise cost us in terms of productivity, health, and basic sanity?
